userid.description: ID of the user associated with the campaign

segmentid.description: ID of the segment associated with the campaign

bounceid.description: ID of the bounce associated with the campaign

sendid.description: ID of the send operation related to the campaign

threadid.description: ID of the thread associated with the campaign

seriesid.description: ID of the series the campaign belongs to

formid.description: ID of the form associated with the campaign

basetemplateid.description: ID of the base template for the campaign

basemessageid.description: ID of the base message for the campaign

addressid.description: ID of the address associated with the campaign

ldate.description: Last update date of the campaign

opens.description: Number of opens for the campaign

uniqueopens.description: Unique number of opens for the campaign

linkclicks.description: Number of link clicks in the campaign

uniquelinkclicks.description: Unique number of link clicks for the campaign

subscriberclicks.description: Number of subscriber clicks for the campaign

forwards.description: Number of forwards for the campaign

uniqueforwards.description: Unique number of forwards for the campaign

hardbounces.description: Number of hard bounces for the campaign

softbounces.description: Number of soft bounces for the campaign

unsubscribes.description: Number of unsubscribes for the campaign

unsubreasons.description: Reasons for unsubscribing from the campaign

socialshares.description: Number of social shares for the campaign

replies.description: Number of replies for the campaign

uniquereplies.description: Unique number of replies for the campaign

mail_transfer.description: Mail transfer settings for the campaign

mail_send.description: Mail sending settings for the campaign

mail_cleanup.description: Cleanup settings for mail related to the campaign

mailer_log_file.description: Log file for mailer activity related to the campaign

tracklinks.description: Link tracking settings for the campaign

tracklinksanalytics.description: Link tracking analytics settings for the campaign

trackreads.description: Read tracking settings for the campaign

trackreadsanalytics.description: Read tracking analytics settings for the campaign

analytics_campaign_name.description: Name of the campaign for analytics purposes

facebook.description: Facebook sharing settings for the campaign

embed_images.description: Flag indicating whether images are embedded in the campaign

htmlunsub.description: HTML unsubscribe settings for the campaign

textunsub.description: Text unsubscribe settings for the campaign

htmlunsubdata.description: Data related to HTML unsubscribe for the campaign

textunsubdata.description: Data related to text unsubscribe for the campaign

willrecur.description: Flag indicating if the campaign will recur

split_offset_type.description: Type of offset for split campaigns

split_winner_messageid.description: Message ID of split campaign winner

split_winner_awaiting.description: Status of winner selection for split campaigns

responder_offset.description: Offset for responders in the campaign

responder_type.description: Type of responders set for the campaign

responder_existing.description: Existing responder settings for the campaign

reminder_field.description: Reminder field settings for the campaign

reminder_format.description: Format of the reminder for the campaign

reminder_type.description: Type of reminder set for the campaign

reminder_last_cron_run.description: Last cron run time for reminders

activerss_interval.description: The interval for Activerss feed updates

activerss_items.description: Number of items in Activerss feed

ip4.description: IP address associated with the campaign

laststep.description: Last step taken in the campaign

managetext.description: Text management settings for the campaign

waitpreview.description: Preview settings for wait actions in the campaign

deletestamp.description: Timestamp for deletion of the campaign

replysys.description: Settings related to replies for the campaign

campaignMessage.description: Message associated with the campaign links

campaignMessages.description: Messages associated with the campaign links

campaignLists.description: Lists associated with the campaign links
